levels.description:
Passive Effect: When a trap is triggered, <$ba.stun>Stuns</> all surrounding targets, lasting for <@ba.vup>{stun}</>s
Active Effect: Sets up Deployable Shield to increase this unit's DEF by <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>; Attack Range <@ba.vdown>reduces</>; Attacks deal splash Physical damage to all enemies around the target that ignores <@ba.vup>{def_penetrate_fixed}</> of their DEF
<@ba.rem>Gains 1 trap when this skill ends</>
